p: “We include both people who inject drugs (PWID, n=17) and people who use drugs (PWUD) but do not inject (n=14), because while injection with contaminated syringes is one of the most efficient ways to become infected with HIV, PWID and PWUD can be at risk for becoming infected through highrisk sexual behaviors. In addition, PWID and PWUD often are parts of the same drug using networks”. This should be moved to methods.
